text: Franca Maria Norsa (31 July 1920 – 9 August 2020), known professionally as Franca Valeri, was an Italian actress. She was known for her roles in It Happened in the Park, The Sign of Venus, A Hero of Our Times, II vedovo, and in Love in First Class. Valeri was born in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. She was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease in 2014. Valeri died on 9 August 2020 in Rome, aged 100.È morta Franca Valeri, addio alla comicità femminile che sapeva graffiare: aveva appena compiuto 100 anni ==References== ==More reading== * Emanuela Martini, Franca Valeri: una signora molto snob, Lindau, 2000, ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian centenarians Category:Actors from Milan
title: Franca Valeri
